title: Why is Garen being kept weak for being a "beginner" champion but Annie's dominant for patches now?
body:
She's been having a 54% win rate for a very long time now, while being one of the easiest champions to play, and a quote on quote "beginner's" champion.

Meanwhile Garen's sitting at a measly 47%

All that, and also the ability to be a good tank as well.

Any champ in the game can build tanky if they want. Nothing stopping your fed Viktor from buying Warmog's into Sunfire into GA if he wants to. Not that he _should_ buy these things, but regardless, if he did he still wouldn't be a tank. He's just be tank_y_. Item builds do not define a champ's class.

So items don't turn Juggernauts into tanks. Got it. That leaves us with looking towards their kits, so let's take a look at Garen's. 

Damage Q, anti-burst W, damage E, and damage R. This guy's kit is obviously designed to murder people. Compare this to the kits of actual tanks like Poppy, Maokai, Braum, etc. who are loaded with CC and HP scalings.

Here's a helpful hint Draco can use in the future: Juggernauts build tanky to empower themselves, whereas tanks build tanky to empower their team.

Theres dozens of ways to bring back garen to a reasonable state.
Making his w cap scale higher by increasing the cap for every point in W. Infinite scaling could work but skeptical on that one.
Returning his tenacity is also an option.

Some people have stated how atrocious his early game is due to his spin dealing beyond mediocre damage early game you gain roughly 14 damage or less for leveling it and that is over 3s pre level 10. Merely adding something like 8/10/12/14/16 base damage to his tick damage would bring him up to speed early. 
For general math this would add 40/50/72/98/112 damage over 3s if you put a point in e at every opportunity

His ms has been nerfed in multiple ways by losing 5 on base and 5% boost on Q. These could always be reverted since dead mans has long been nerfed.

The Rylais meta also hasn't helped him much with his slow cleanse not helping him deal with anything since he is being slowed at every moment.
I'm skeptical on this but if Garen's Q instead of removing slows made him immune to slows for the first 1s of Q to prevent mass re-application of slows he'd be a LOT better overall.

If he got even only 1-2 of these changes he'd improve considerably

garen has literally zero mechanics in his kit and Riot added a gimmick instead of doing anything thatd help 

that said I predict he will benefit from several of the itemization changes next patch, but something like letting spin stack new Fervor would be very choice IMO
